overview: From 2025-11-02 to 2025-11-03, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 3 new PRs (2 merged), 0 new issues, and 5 active contributors.

topPRs.title: op-dispute-mon: node endpoint error metrics
topPRs.author: pauldowman
topPRs.body:
This PR adds the following prometheus metrics to dispute-mon:

* Gauge of total number of endpoints that returned an error (other than not found) during the last update cycle - note this is the number of rpcs that had at least 1 failure, so if the same rpc gives an error on 10 games that still counts as 1.
* Gauge of total number of failures (other than not found) in the last update cycle. This counts each error from an rpc as a new event even if the rpc is the same (so one rpc giving 10 errors sets this to 10).
* Gauge of the total number of games where some nodes reported not found and others had the block in the last update cycle.
* Gauge of the total number of games where some nodes reported the output root as safe and others as unsafe in the last update cycle
* Gauge of the total number of games where nodes returned different expected output roots in the last update cycle

Reviewers might want to look at each commit separately, there's one for each metric.

Closes #11020

topPRs.title: opcm: Set cannon_kona init bond during upgrade
topPRs.author: Inphi
topPRs.body: Fixes a bug in opcm.upgrade where the CANNON_KONA initial bond was not set.

topPRs.title: mise: Define fake install sources for disabled tools
topPRs.author: ajsutton
topPRs.body: The latest mise (installed by brew) errors if tools don't have a known install source even if they're disabled. While we control the version of mise used in CI, local development depends on an existing mise to bootstrap and there isn't a good way to ensure it is using a specific version.

topPRs.title: Remove redundant path join in update-op-geth helper
topPRs.author: Doryu001
topPRs.body: Drop the unused os import from update-op-geth.py pass the already-correct project value directly to subprocess.run, eliminating the redundant os.path.join call

topContributors.summary: MrLightspeed: Primarily focused on feature work, opening three pull requests (ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io#1236, #1235, #1234) to add a Creator Coin on Base, and modified 833 files with a significant net addition of 46,901 lines, predominantly in configuration files.
ajsutton: Engaged in code quality assurance today, providing 3 reviews, including 2 approvals, and contributing to discussions by commenting on 1 issue.

opgitgovernance: Focused on maintenance and tooling, opening two PRs, ethereum-optimism/optimism#18107 and ethereum-optimism/superchain-registry#1138, which involved minor code changes across tests and configuration files.
Doryu001: Focused on minor code improvements, opening a pull request in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#18108) to remove a redundant path join, reflecting a primary focus on other work.
pauldowman: Focused on bugfix work, making a single commit that modified 20 files with a net addition of 1952 lines across various file types.
